name: Well-down
description:
Well Down

You are the knight "Pickaxe Head". While you were walking with your son, he was having fun on the edge of a well and fell into it... Headlong you dive into it ! But it seems that you were not alone in this dark place and you decided to go deeper and deeper to bring back your beloved son...

Controls : 

C/(X) : Jump 

X/(Square) :  Dash 

Left Shift/(Circle) : climb
